name: All MAC Address Formats
description: 13:bc:16:ff:45:3413-bc-16-ff-45-34dead.beef.cafeWrong format, will not detect:dead-beef-cafeDetects only possible MAC addresses, not detecting letters above F:unkn.owna.ddreun:kn:ow:na:dd:reun-kn-ow-na-dd-reLove,Jason C. Rochon
